description:
Featuring Yoast SEO plugin 3.2.5 and WordPress 4.5.2

Implementing OnPage SEO for your WordPress site essential if you want to rank your content in Google and other search engines. 

Learn the best WordPress SEO strategy that I use to successfully  target competitive keywords and sell a catalogue of products online.

This course will teach you how to rank in Search Engine Page Results and drive laser targeted traffic to your money page with perfectly optimised WordPress pages.

Primarily over-the-shoulder screen capture videos will show you exactly how to configure over 15 free plugins and deploy content silos to become an SEO ninja webmaster.
title: WordPress Samurai: SEO Rocket Edition
